programme.desc: Three Brooklyn cops wind up at the same deadly location after enduring vastly different career paths.

programme.desc: Paul Walker stars as an undercover cop in Detroit, teaming with an ex-con to take down a crime lord.

programme.desc: A group of friends become involved in a potentially deadly diamond heist.

programme.desc: A black man teams up with his awkward, white step-grandson to defeat his rival in a domino tournament.

programme.title: Good Fences
programme.desc: Whoopi Goldberg and Danny Glover star as a couple adjusting to their new life after moving to Connecticut.

programme.desc: The story of how sharecropper take on a racist San Francisco corporation in 1971.

programme.desc: A therapist treats a black stripper who has multiple personality disorder.

programme.desc: Will Smith stars as a young man who cons his way to into the life an affluent NYC couple.
